metadata.title: CVE-2023-1528 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Passwords in Google Chrome prior to 111.0.5563.110allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
